appName: Warren Heathcote AI & Aluminium Innovation Hub
description: Premier executive command center integrating strategic leadership, AI-driven business intelligence, luxury lifestyle management, creative wellness initiatives, and comprehensive SharePoint/Xero integration. Features dual-persona architecture for Warren's Executive Suite and Yanika's Creative Oasis.
capabilities: Executive dashboard with real-time business intelligence
AI-powered chat assistant for strategic insights (dual-persona support)
Dual-persona management (Warren Executive + Yanika Creative Oasis)
SharePoint library management with futuristic UI and analytics
Xero financial integration with real-time analytics and invoice generation
Power BI dashboard integration for advanced business intelligence
Luxury lifestyle & motorsport tracking for executive management
Investment & cryptocurrency portfolio management with market tracking
AI Dermatology chatbot for personalized skincare advice (Dubai climate-specific)
Content updates & scheduling system for multi-platform publishing
Dubai wellness hub with family & travel moments tracking
Multi-platform social media console with engagement metrics
Companies House integration for business intelligence

workflows.name: Executive Dashboard Access
workflows.description: Warren accesses his executive command center with real-time business metrics
steps: User authentication and persona detection
Load executive dashboard with diamond gold theme
Fetch real-time data from SharePoint, Xero, Power BI
Display innovation metrics, motorsport tracking, investment portfolio
Enable AI chat assistant for strategic insights

workflows.name: Creative Wellness Management
workflows.description: Yanika manages her Dubai wellness business and creative projects
steps: User authentication and persona detection
Load creative oasis dashboard with Dubai pink-purple theme
Display wellness score, creative projects, family events
Access AI dermatology assistant for client consultations
Track Instagram campaigns and content scheduling

workflows.name: SharePoint Integration
workflows.description: Seamless document access and analytics from embedded SharePoint
steps: Detect iframe embedding environment
Load SharePoint library grid with category filters
Enable real-time document search and navigation
Track usage analytics and user engagement
Sync updates with SharePoint backend

workflows.name: Xero Financial Analytics
workflows.description: Real-time financial data visualization and invoice generation
steps: Authenticate with Xero API
Fetch financial data (revenue, expenses, cash flow)
Generate visual dashboards with charts
Enable invoice creation and tracking
Sync with Power BI for advanced analytics

workflows.name: AI-Powered Dermatology Consultation
workflows.description: Yanika provides AI-assisted skincare consultations for Dubai clients
steps: Client initiates chat in dermatology section
AI analyzes skin concerns and Dubai climate factors
Provide personalized product recommendations
Schedule follow-up treatments via WhatsApp
Track client wellness progress over time

workflows.name: Marketing Campaign Management
workflows.description: Track and optimize Instagram marketing campaigns
steps: Access marketing analytics dashboard
View campaign performance metrics (ROI, engagement)
Analyze Instagram profile insights (@yanika.heathcote)
Update content calendar and schedule posts
Generate campaign reports and optimization suggestions

business_rules.name: Dual-Persona Access Control
business_rules.description: Enforce separate access and data isolation for Warren and Yanika personas

business_rules.name: SharePoint Iframe Optimization
business_rules.description: Detect and optimize UI when embedded in SharePoint iframe

business_rules.name: Real-Time Data Synchronization
business_rules.description: Ensure financial and wellness data syncs in real-time with external systems

business_rules.name: AI Response Personalization
business_rules.description: AI chat assistant adapts responses based on Warren/Yanika persona

business_rules.name: Dubai Climate Awareness
business_rules.description: AI dermatology recommendations account for Dubai's extreme climate
